title: What is KnowMyVIBE?
content: KnowMyVIBE is a social networking platform designed to connect people with similar interests. Whether youâ€™re looking for a hiking buddy, a book club, or professional networking opportunities, KnowMyVIBE helps you find your community.

title: Is KnowMyVIBE free to use?
content: Yes, KnowMyVIBE is free to use. However, we also offer a Premium plan that unlocks additional features like advanced search filters, priority support, and exclusive group access.

title: How do I join or create a group?
content: You can browse existing groups based on your interests or create your own group from your dashboard. Groups can be public or private, depending on your preferences.

title: Can I find jobs using KnowMyVIBE?
content: Yes, we offer a dedicated section for job seekers and recruiters. You can create a professional profile to showcase your skills, and companies can search for candidates based on their needs.

title: Is my personal information safe?
content: We take your privacy seriously. Your data is encrypted, and we follow industry-standard practices to ensure your information is safe. For more details, read our Privacy Policy.

title: Who can I contact for support?
content: If you have any questions or issues, you can reach our support team via the 'Help Center' on our website. We're here to assist you!
